defaultRules.rule: .hide_tweet_analytics div:has(> a[aria-label$='View post analytics']) {display: none;}
.hide_premium a[href='/i/premium_sign_up'] {display: none;}
.hide_try_premium_for_free_today div:has(> div > aside[aria-label='Try Premium for free today']) {display: none;}
.hide_what_is_happening div:has(> section > div[aria-label='Timeline: Trending now']) {display: none;}
.hide_who_to_follow_sidebar div:has(> div > aside[aria-label='Who to follow']) {display: none;}
.hide_footer nav[aria-label='Footer'] {display: none;}
.hide_messages_drawer div[data-testid='DMDrawer'] {display: none;}
.hide_grok a[href='/i/grok'] {display: none;}
.hide_verified_orgs a[href='/i/verified-orgs-signup'] {display: none;}
.hide_communities a[aria-label='Communities'] {display: none;}
.hide_premium_longer_posts div:has(> div > aside[aria-label='Subscribe to Premium to write your own longer posts']) {display: none;}

.hide_who_to_follow :is(div:has(> div > div > a[href='/i/connect_people?user_id=']), div:has(+ div > div > div > a[href='/i/connect_people?user_id=']), div:has(+ div + div > div > div > a[href='/i/connect_people?user_id=']), div:has(+ div + div + div > div > div > a[href='/i/connect_people?user_id=']), div:has(+ div + div + div + div > div > div > a[href='/i/connect_people?user_id='])) {display: none;}

.hide_pinned_by_people_you_follow :is(div:has(> div > div > button > a[href='/i/topics/pinned']), div:has(> div > div > button > a[href='/i/topics/pinned']) + div, div:has(> div > div > button > a[href='/i/topics/pinned']) + div + div, div:has(> div > div > button > a[href='/i/topics/pinned']) + div + div + div) {display: none;}
.hide_subscribe_to_premium_to_write_your_own_articles div:has(> div > aside[aria-label='Subscribe to Premium+ to write your own Articles']) {display: none;}

.hide_discover_new_communities :is(div:has(> div > div > a[href='/i/communities/suggested']), div:has(+ div > div > div > a[href='/i/communities/suggested']), div:has(+ div + div > div > div > a[href='/i/communities/suggested'])) {display: none;}
.hide_go_ad_free_with_premium div:has(> div > div > div > div > div > a[href='/i/premium_sign_up?tier=premium_plus&referring_page=timeline_prompt']) {display: none;}

.hide_creators_for_you :is(div:has(> div > div > a[href='/i/connect_people?user_id=&is_creator_only=true']), div:has(+ div > div > div > a[href='/i/connect_people?user_id=&is_creator_only=true']), div:has(+ div + div > div > div > a[href='/i/connect_people?user_id=&is_creator_only=true']), div:has(+ div + div + div > div > div > a[href='/i/connect_people?user_id=&is_creator_only=true']), div:has(+ div + div + div + div > div > div > a[href='/i/connect_people?user_id=&is_creator_only=true'])) {display: none;}
.hide_jobs a[href='/jobs'] {display: none;}
.hide_get_40_off_a_year_of_Premium div:has(> div > div > div > div > div > div > img[src='https://ton.twitter.com/onboarding/subscriptions/AnniversaryInlinePrompt.png']) {display: none;}
.hide_premium_offer :is(div:has(> aside[aria-label='40% off Premium ']), div:has(> aside[aria-label='Expiring soon!'])) {display: none;}
.hide_live_on_x :is(div:has( > div > button[aria-label^='Space']), div:has( > div > button[aria-label^='Broadcast'])) {display: none;}
.hide_subscribe_to_premium div:has(> div > aside[aria-label='Subscribe to Premium']) {display: none;}
.hide_boost_your_replies_with_premium div:has(> div > aside[aria-label='Boost your replies with Premium']) {display: none;}
.test div:has(> div > aside[aria-label='Boost your replies with Premium']) {display: none;}
